1: <sup>1</sup> Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.
2: <sup>2</sup> O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.
3: <sup>3</sup> Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
4: <sup>4</sup> Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.
5: <sup>5</sup> Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
6: <sup>6</sup> Remember, O LORD, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.
7: <sup>7</sup> Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O LORD.
8: <sup>8</sup> Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
9: <sup>9</sup> The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
10: <sup>10</sup> All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
11: <sup>11</sup> For thy name’s sake, O LORD, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.
12: <sup>12</sup> What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
13: <sup>13</sup> His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.
14: <sup>14</sup> The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
15: <sup>15</sup> Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
16: <sup>16</sup> Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
17: <sup>17</sup> The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
18: <sup>18</sup> Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.
19: <sup>19</sup> Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.
20: <sup>20</sup> O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
21: <sup>21</sup> Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.
22: <sup>22</sup> Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
